                                                                                                                        【你们听到了吗<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/6e/2018new_leimu_org.png" title="[泪]" alt="[泪]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;"><a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E9%95%BF%E6%B1%9F%E5%A4%A7%E6%A1%A5%E8%BD%A6%E8%BE%86%E5%81%9C%E8%BD%A6%E9%B8%A3%E7%AC%9B%23&amp;from=default">#武汉长江大桥车辆停车鸣笛#</a>】4日10时，武汉车辆停车鸣笛。延时<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%88%AA%E6%8B%8D%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E9%95%BF%E6%B1%9F%E5%A4%A7%E6%A1%A5%E5%93%80%E6%82%BC%E7%94%BB%E9%9D%A2%23&amp;from=default">#航拍武汉长江大桥哀悼画面#</a>↓↓愿逝者安息，生者奋发！&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489937560463105:1034-video:1034%3A4489937370677263:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489937560463105:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6Z8wgo3" alt="http://t.cn/A6Z8wgo3" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4489932988788347&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>129369</em></span>                        </span></span></a>
                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IBJqp96I8&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Frmrb&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

        <div class="WB_detail">

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B8%85%E6%98%8E%E7%A5%AD%23&amp;from=default">#清明祭#</a>【此刻，无论你在哪儿，一起转发，祭奠逝去的同胞】2020年4月4日，全国哀悼，10时起<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E9%BB%98%E5%93%80%E4%B8%89%E5%88%86%E9%92%9F%23&amp;from=default">#全中国默哀三分钟#</a>。此刻，防空警报正在鸣响，汽车、火车、舰船同时鸣笛。无论身在何处，请一起<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%93%80%E6%82%BC%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E7%89%BA%E7%89%B2%E7%83%88%E5%A3%AB%E5%92%8C%E9%80%9D%E4%B8%96%E5%90%8C%E8%83%9E%23&amp;from=default">#哀悼抗击新冠疫情牺牲烈士和逝世同胞#</a>。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【转发传递！今天，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E9%BB%98%E5%93%80%E4%B8%89%E5%88%86%E9%92%9F%23&amp;from=default">#全中国默哀三分钟#</a>】为表达对抗击新冠肺炎疫情斗争牺牲烈士和逝世同胞的深切哀悼，2020年4月4日举行全国性哀悼活动。全国和驻外使领馆下半旗志哀，全国停止公共娱乐活动。4月4日10时起，全国人民默哀3分钟，汽车、火车、舰船鸣笛，防空警报鸣响。现场直播↓↓ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489924219061695:1034-video:1034%3A4489933700923424:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489924219061695:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZQgHqs" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZQgHqs" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBJl3C1mn" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489924219061695:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489924219061695&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%B8%82%E6%B0%91%E6%8B%8D%E6%91%84%E9%99%8D%E5%8D%8A%E6%97%97%23&amp;from=default">#武汉市民拍摄降半旗#</a>】早上8点52分，武汉江汉关大楼前，一名普通武汉市民穿着防护服，来纪念这个特殊的日子，表达对逝者的缅怀。武汉不会忘记，中国不会忘记！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B8%85%E6%98%8E%E7%A5%AD%23&amp;from=default">#清明祭#</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                <li><a action-type="thrid_rend_iframe" href="javascript:void(0)" suda-data="" action-data="width=660&amp;height=556&amp;mid=4489920024686715&amp;src=%2F%2Fpromote.vip.weibo.com%2Fpromoteadvance%3Fdai_tou%3Dpc_profile_01%26touid%3D2803301701%26mid%3D4489920024686715&amp;title=推广" title="帮上头条">帮上头条</a></li>
                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                        <li>
                                <span class="hover">

        </div>
    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489912419967588" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBJ21FP1y?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 09:00" date="1585962001000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489912419967588:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 09:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/19DcdW" rel="nofollow">微博视频</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【今日清明，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E4%B8%8B%E5%8D%8A%E6%97%97%23&amp;from=default">#武汉下半旗#</a>】这是4月4日清晨<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E8%A1%97%E5%A4%B4%E4%B8%8B%E5%8D%8A%E6%97%97%E7%94%BB%E9%9D%A2%23&amp;from=default">#武汉街头下半旗画面#</a>。送别，缅怀，铭记！&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489912419967588:1034-video:1034%3A4489912024498187:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489912419967588:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZQRwF9" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZQRwF9" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【转发传递！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%A9%E5%AE%89%E9%97%A8%E5%B9%BF%E5%9C%BA%E9%99%8D%E5%8D%8A%E6%97%97%E5%85%A8%E8%BF%87%E7%A8%8B%23&amp;from=default">#天安门广场降半旗全过程#</a> 】今晨，天安门广场举行下半旗仪式，哀悼抗击新冠疫情牺牲烈士和逝世同胞。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B8%85%E6%98%8E%E7%A5%AD%23&amp;from=default">#清明祭#</a>，我们永远铭记！ ​​​​<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489908259451486:2017607-video:2017607%3A4489885705502736:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489908259451486:2803301701" title="北京日报都视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZQoUK9" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZQoUK9" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>北京日报都视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E18%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增18例境外输入#</a>】4月3日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例19例，其中18例为境外输入病例，1例为本土病例（湖北1例）；新增死亡病例4例（湖北4例）；新增疑似病例11例，均为境外输入病例。境外输入现有确诊病例698例（含重症病例17例），现有疑似病例 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBIQL9SWg" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489905432356140:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489905432356140&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%8564%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增无症状感染者64例#</a>】31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染者64例,其中境外输入无症状感染者26例；当日转为确诊病例3例（境外输入转为确诊2例）；当日解除医学观察58例。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B0%9A%E5%9C%A8%E5%8C%BB%E5%AD%A6%E8%A7%82%E5%AF%9F%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%80%851030%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#尚在医学观察无症状感染者1030例#</a>（境外输入239例）。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489891868190151" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBIuSymDd?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 07:38" date="1585957102000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489891868190151:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 07:38</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【缅怀！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%234%E6%9C%884%E6%97%A5%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%B8%82%E5%8C%BA%E8%BD%A6%E8%BE%86%E5%81%9C%E6%AD%A2%E8%A1%8C%E9%A9%B63%E5%88%86%E9%92%9F%23&amp;from=default">#4月4日武汉市区车辆停止行驶3分钟#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%85%A8%E5%B8%82%E8%B0%83%E8%87%B3%E7%BA%A2%E7%81%AF3%E5%88%86%E9%92%9F%23&amp;from=default">#武汉全市调至红灯3分钟#</a>】据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E4%BA%A4%E8%AD%A6?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=武汉交警">@武汉交警</a> ，湖北省暨武汉市悼念新冠肺炎疫情牺牲烈士和逝世同胞活动，将于4月4日上午10时在汉口江滩一元路广场举行。届时，武汉市区主干道和支干道的红绿灯，将在10时至10时03分管控调整为红灯，路面所有车辆停止行驶3分钟。 ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E8%B6%85108%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全球确诊新冠肺炎超108万例#</a> 美国破27万例】据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学实时统计数据显示，截至北京时间4日4时32分，全球新冠肺炎确诊病例已突破108万例，达1088878例，死亡病例达58382例。数据显示，全球新冠肺炎确诊病例最多的国家是美国，累计突破27万例，达270473例；死亡病例最多的国家是意大利 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBInzgxy1" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489887333942209:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489887333942209&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        </li>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2803301701&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4489887333942209"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>935</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

        </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609514878&amp;ssig=kxSe2u7LMw" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489879762769035" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBIbmbClR?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 06:50" date="1585954215000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489879762769035:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 06:50</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E8%B6%8527%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#美国新冠肺炎确诊超27万#</a>，死亡超过7000例】据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学发布的全球新冠肺炎数据实时统计系统，截至美国东部时间4月3日晚6时，全美共报告新冠肺炎确诊273880例，死亡7077例，治愈9521例。过去24小时,新增确诊31698例，新增死亡1319例。（人民日报记者张梦旭） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【缅怀！全国<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2360%E5%90%8D%E5%85%AC%E5%AE%89%E6%B0%91%E8%AD%A6%E5%92%8C35%E5%90%8D%E8%BE%85%E8%AD%A6%E7%89%BA%E7%89%B2%23&amp;from=default">#60名公安民警和35名辅警牺牲#</a>在战疫一线】截至4月2日，全国共有60名公安民警和35名辅警牺牲在抗击疫情和维护安全稳定第一线，用宝贵生命谱写了一曲曲人民公安为人民的英雄赞歌。清明，缅怀！（张璁） ​​​​                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489877372431914" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBI7vacEq?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 06:40" date="1585953646000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489877372431914:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 06:40</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B8%85%E6%98%8E%23&amp;from=default">#清明#</a>，不忘】今天，记住那些逝去的人，铭记他们的牺牲，更向所有坚守和奉献致敬。转发，缅怀！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B8%85%E6%98%8E%E7%A5%AD%23&amp;from=default">#清明祭#</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4489781448936633" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBFCMBuPf?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-04 00:19" date="1585930776000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489781448936633:fromprofile"> 2020-4-4 00:19</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A4585%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#意大利新增确诊4585例#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A119827%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#意大利累计确诊119827例#</a>】根据意大利民事保护部门公布的最近数据，截至当地时间4月3日18时，意大利现有新冠肺炎确诊病例85388例，死亡14681例，治愈19758例，累计确诊病例119827例，较4月2日18时新增确诊4585例，新增766例死亡病例。（人民日报记者韩硕） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4489768987320049" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBFiGuIhj?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-03 23:30" date="1585927805000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489768987320049:fromprofile"> 2020-4-3 23:30</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%A5%BD%EF%BC%8C%E6%98%8E%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#你好，明天#</a>】在承认财务造假22亿后，瑞幸咖啡被意外买爆，这样的“高光时刻”，是一种耻辱。商场如战场不假，但比输掉战斗更可怕的丧失底线。瑞幸的自欺欺人，不仅损害了投资人利益，更在折损中国企业的海外声誉。光有幸运没有诚信，不可能长久成为市场的宠儿。对上市公司财务造假，必须零容忍！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B9%E8%88%B1%E5%8F%A3%E8%BF%B0%E5%8F%B2%23&amp;from=default">#方舱口述史#</a> | 康复患者回忆凌晨两点接到通知入住方舱】桂先生，39岁，是2月11日首批方舱医院出院的患者，他凌晨两点接到入住方舱的通知；“整个过程我很平静，只是觉得自己在这样一个环境当中，了解了方舱医院的一种生活方式”；他也很想献血浆，去救助其他的重症患者。&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489762804996943:1034-video:1034%3A4489770982899750:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489762804996943:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZHEwlq" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZHEwlq" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

    <div class="screen_box"><a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="fl_menu"><i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down S_ficon">c</i></a>
        <div class="layer_menu_list" style="display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 999;" node-type="fl_menu_right">
            <ul>
                                                                                <li><a action-type="thrid_rend_iframe" href="javascript:void(0)" suda-data="" action-data="width=660&amp;height=556&amp;mid=4489750821842143&amp;src=%2F%2Fpromote.vip.weibo.com%2Fpromoteadvance%3Fdai_tou%3Dpc_profile_01%26touid%3D2803301701%26mid%3D4489750821842143&amp;title=推广" title="帮上头条">帮上头条</a></li>
                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>

                                <span class="hover">

                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609514900&amp;ssig=Vk8M2olhNP" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489750821842143" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBEPo7JdZ?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-03 22:17" date="1585923473000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489750821842143:fromprofile"> 2020-4-3 22:17</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/PBP2P" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【夜读：享受孤独，而不是忍受孤独】想玩、想有人陪，都是自然而然的情绪，但只有把生活中那些表面的花里胡哨洗刷干净，让它露出朴素的真实面孔，我们才能真正找到一条能从容踏上的路。享受孤独，而不是忍受孤独。明白了这个道理，或许才算真正成熟。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489750821842143:1022-article:1022%3A2309404489750818980146:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489750821842143:2803301701" title="【夜读】享受孤独，而不是忍受孤独" href="http://t.cn/A6ZHadBw" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZHadBw" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_longwb">°</i>【夜读】享受孤独，而不是忍受孤独</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->

        <div class="media_box">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AF%94%E5%B0%94%E7%9B%96%E8%8C%A8%E8%AF%B4%E5%A4%9A%E4%BA%8F%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%8E%A7%E5%88%B6%E4%BD%8F%E4%BA%86%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#比尔盖茨说多亏中国控制住了疫情#</a>】4月3日，比尔·盖茨接受主持人采访时表示，美国和中国不一样，“我们做不到像武汉那样严格执行封城，我们也无法达到那种追踪接触者的方式，做不到一个不漏。谢天谢地中国控制住了疫情，如果中国再出现大的反弹，你就几乎不可能再控制住它（新冠病毒）了。” ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBELaldYl" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489748205058601:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489748205058601&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4489739044059653" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBEwoh26h?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-03 21:31" date="1585920666000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489739044059653:fromprofile"> 2020-4-3 21:31</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E6%89%98%E6%96%AF%E5%8D%A1%E7%BA%B3%E5%B0%86%E8%AF%95%E9%AA%8C%E4%B8%AD%E8%8D%89%E8%8D%AF%23&amp;from=default">#意大利托斯卡纳将试验中草药#</a>】据意大利《共和国报》2日报道，意大利托斯卡纳卡雷吉大学综合医院下属科研机构计划对中草药治疗新冠肺炎的有效性进行试验。<br>卡雷吉大学综合医院植物疗法与整合医学研创中心负责人费伦佐利称，日前在与中国抗疫医疗专家组的交流中获得了中药治疗新冠肺炎并取得效果的信 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBEwoh26h" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489739044059653:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489739044059653&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2803301701&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4489739044059653"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>4836</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->
                    <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_like" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4489739044059653&amp;loc=profile&amp;cuslike=1&amp;hide_multi_attitude=1&amp;liked=0" title="赞" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=like"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1">
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>75562</em></span>                        </span></span></a>
                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
            <div node-type="feed_list_repeat" class="WB_feed_repeat S_bg1" style="display:none;"></div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489731280972229" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBEjS44V7?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-03 21:00" date="1585918815000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489731280972229:fromprofile"> 2020-4-3 21:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/19DcdW" rel="nofollow">微博视频</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%8E%E6%98%A5%E8%8E%B9%E8%AF%B4%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%8F%B4%E5%8A%A9%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E5%AD%90%E9%83%BD%E6%B2%A1%E8%A7%81%E5%88%B0%23&amp;from=default">#华春莹说美国援助一个子都没见到#</a>】4月3日，就蓬佩奥称美国对中国抗疫援助远超中国对美国援助，外交部发言人华春莹表示，蓬佩奥和美方曾宣布向中国等一些国家提供1亿美元的援助，但是我们一个子都没见到，倒是很想问问美国欠联合国和世卫组织的会费不知道交清了没有。&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489731280972229:1034-video:1034%3A4489730692415510:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489731280972229:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZHL2wz" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZHL2wz" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4489727614920829" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBEdXkE8d?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-03 20:45" date="1585917941000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489727614920829:fromprofile"> 2020-4-3 20:45</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%8B%B1%E5%9B%BD%E9%A6%96%E7%9B%B8%E5%B0%86%E7%BB%A7%E7%BB%AD%E8%87%AA%E6%88%91%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%23&amp;from=default">#英国首相将继续自我隔离#</a>】当地时间4月3日，英国首相鲍里斯·约翰逊在社交媒体发布视频称，他虽然感觉有好转，已经完成了7天的自我隔离，但是还有发烧症状，根据政府的防疫指导意见，将继续自我隔离，直到症状消失。当地时间3月27日，鲍里斯·约翰逊新冠病毒检测呈阳性。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <ul>

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                        <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IBDU1hd9f&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>

        <div class="WB_detail">

                                <a name="4489715254102121" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBDU1hd9f?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-03 19:56" date="1585914994000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489715254102121:fromprofile"> 2020-4-3 19:56</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/PBP2P" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E9%94%90%E8%AF%84%23&amp;from=default">#人民锐评#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%94%A9%E9%94%85%E7%BB%99%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E8%B5%B6%E4%B8%8D%E8%B7%91%E6%9D%A5%E5%8A%BF%E6%B1%B9%E6%B1%B9%E7%9A%84%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%23&amp;from=default">#甩锅给中国赶不跑来势汹汹的病毒#</a>】美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学发布的最新统计数据显示，全球新冠肺炎确诊病例累计超过100万例，死亡病例超过5万例。疫情越是猖獗，人类越需步伐一致；病毒越是强大，国际社会越需拉起最严密的联防联控网络。面对疫情，各国命运与共，污蔑攻击、甩锅推责都 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBDU1hd9f" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489715254102121:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489715254102121&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4489706958390145" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBDGDzcEV?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-03 19:23" date="1585913015000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489706958390145:fromprofile"> 2020-4-3 19:23</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%91%E5%8D%9755%E5%B2%81%E6%B0%91%E8%AD%A6%E5%80%92%E5%9C%A8%E8%84%B1%E8%B4%AB%E5%92%8C%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#云南55岁民警倒在脱贫和抗疫一线#</a>】4月1日10时许，云南昭通巧家县公安局民警王代权因肝癌，倒在脱贫攻坚和疫情防控第一线。王代权今年55岁，从警35年，是公认的“老黄牛”，今年3月，病床上的他还打电话给当地村干部和群众了解工作。4月1日，因病情恶化，王代权与世长辞。一路走好！ ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBDGDzcEV" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489706958390145:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489706958390145&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2803301701&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4489706958390145"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>2760</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

                    <span class="arrow" node-type="cmtarrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

            </ul>
        </div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489695494645083" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBDo9juoH?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-03 18:38" date="1585910283000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489695494645083:fromprofile"> 2020-4-3 18:38</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%A4%A9%E6%B2%B3%E6%9C%BA%E5%9C%BA%E5%B7%B2%E5%85%A8%E9%9D%A2%E6%B6%88%E6%9D%80%23&amp;from=default">#武汉天河机场已全面消杀#</a>】今天，武汉市消防救援支队在专家指导下，对武汉天河国际机场航站楼、停车场等区域全方位深度消杀，为机场的全面复航做好准备。（人民日报记者张意轩、乔外、胡润新） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609514900&amp;ssig=Vk8M2olhNP" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4489687274582217" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBDaTje2J?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-03 18:05" date="1585908323000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489687274582217:fromprofile"> 2020-4-3 18:05</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://weibo.com/" rel="nofollow">正能量 · 视频社区</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【用镜头致敬英雄！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BB%994.2%E4%B8%87%E9%A9%B0%E6%8F%B4%E5%8C%BB%E6%8A%A4%E6%8B%8D%E8%82%96%E5%83%8F%23&amp;from=default">#给4.2万驰援医护拍肖像#</a>】疫情发生后，人民日报记者、中国摄影家协会主席李舸和团队为4.2万名驰援前线的医护人员每人拍摄一张肖像。他称，不仅是为了拍照，而是赋予照片一种力量。转发，致敬！&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4489687274582217:1034-video:1034%3A4489686585114630:page_100206_home:2803301701:4489687274582217:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6ZT9r6s" alt="http://t.cn/A6ZT9r6s" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E7%8F%AD%E7%89%99%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A117710%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#西班牙累计确诊117710例新冠肺炎#</a>】据西班牙卫生部3日公布的数据，西班牙较前日新增新冠肺炎确诊病例7472例，新增死亡病例932例，累计确诊病例达117710例，其中10935人死亡，30513人治愈出院。（姜波） ​​​​                                            </div>

    <ul class="WB_media_a  WB_media_a_m1 clearfix" action-data="isPrivate=0&amp;relation=0&amp;clear_picSrc=%2F%2Fwx2.sinaimg.cn%2Fmw690%2Fa716fd45gy1gdgpumzninj20ob0obk0y.jpg">

          <i class="W_loading" style="display:none;"></i>
                     <i class="W_loading" style="display:none;"></i>
                    </li>
    </ul>
                    </div>
    </div>
        <!-- super card-->

                                <a name="4489672560872261" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IBCNa3EUJ?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-03 17:06" date="1585904815000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4489672560872261:fromprofile"> 2020-4-3 17:06</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%9E%E6%B4%B2%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E8%94%93%E5%BB%B650%E5%9B%BD%E8%B6%857000%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#非洲新冠肺炎蔓延50国超7000例#</a>】根据非洲疾控中心发布数据，截至东部非洲时间4月3日9:00（北京时间3日14:00），非洲的50个国家共报告了超过7000例新冠肺炎确诊病例，达到7028例，其中有284例死亡，561例治愈。南非为报告确诊病例最多的国家，达到1462例。目前有14个非洲国家的新冠肺炎确诊病例超过 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IBCNa3EUJ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4489672560872261:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4489672560872261&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

a=$CONFIG,b=FM.view;FM.init({jsPath:a.jsPath,cssPath:a.cssPath,mJsPath:a.mJsPath});FM.view=function(a){a=a||{};var c=a.js,f="domid",g="ns",h,i;c=c&&[].concat(c);a[f]=a[f]||a.pid;a.js=c=c&&c[0];g in a||(a[g]=d(c));a.css=h=[].concat(a.css||[]);a.cssid=i=[].concat(a.cssid||[]);for(var j=i.length,k=h.length;j<k;++j)i[j]=e(h[j]);b(a)}}()
</script>
<script>FM.view({"domid":"pl_lib","js":"home/js/pl/lib.js?version=737b1bcbc5c6542c","jsDefer":true});</script>
